segments.text: Excuse me , waiter , I would like to have some wine before the main course .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you decided what wine you would like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have no idea . Maybe you can give me some advice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I recommend you the white wine . It will wake up your appetite .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great , bring me a bottle of that please .
segments.speaker: S1
